name: CS 101: Introduction to Programming
syllabus_body:
CS 101: Introduction to Programming

Course Description

This course provides a comprehensive introduction to computer programming using Python. Students will learn fundamental concepts including variables, control structures, functions, and basic data structures.

Learning Objectives

  • Understand basic programming concepts and terminology
  • Write simple programs using Python
  • Apply problem-solving techniques to programming challenges
  • Debug and test code effectively

Grading Policy

CategoryWeight
Homework30%
Projects40%
Quizzes30%

Grade Scale

  • A: 90-100%
  • B: 80-89%
  • C: 70-79%
  • D: 60-69%
  • F: Below 60%
public_description: An introductory course to computer programming using Python.
